Feudal Lord's Hankamishimo (Golden Yellow & White, Men)
kDesc
A gorgeous Hankamishimo tailor-made for the feudal lord. Comprises of a white short-sleeves garment and a golden yellow vest. \nDefensive Strength: ★★[#Legal]
Superbe tenue d’apparat faite pour un seigneur. Manches blanches et kataginu doré.\nDéfense : ★★[#Legal]
Ein für einen Fürsten geschneiderter, prachtvoller Han-Kamishimo. Zusammengesetzt aus weißen Ärmeln und goldenem Kataginu.\nVerteidigung: ★★[#Legal]
Uno sgargiante kimono formale confezionato per un ricco signore. Le maniche sono bianche e il kataginu è color oro.\nDifesa: ★★[#Legal]
Un hermoso han-kamishimo confeccionado para un señor. Compuesto de mangas blancas y un kataginu dorado.\nDefensa: ★★[#Legal]
殿様のために仕立てられたきらびやかな半裃。白の小袖と黄金色の肩衣からなる。\n防御力 ：★★[#Legal]
영주님을 위해 만들어진 화려한 반소매 예복. 하얀색의 소매와 황금색의 상의로 이루어져 있다. \n방어력: ★★[#Legal]
A gorgeous Hankamishimo tailor-made for the feudal lord. Comprises of a white short-sleeves garment and a golden yellow vest. \nDefensive Strength: ★★[#Legal]
華麗的半身褶裙，由白色的短袖衣及金黃色的背心配成，專為領主而造。\n防禦力：★★[#Legal]
華麗的半身褶裙，由白色的短袖衣及金黃色的背心配成，專為領主而造。\n防禦力：★★[#Legal]
A gorgeous Hankamishimo tailor-made for the feudal lord. Comprises of a white long-sleeve garment and a golden yellow vest. \nDefensive Strength: ★★[#Legal]
